name: tax-is-provided-in-cvent-events-france-tax;taxes-smoke-ems-272-fr-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-feature-files-tax-calculation-capability-feature-files
title: Tax is provided in Cvent events France Tax

testSteps.description: Given a Tax Name of France TVA and a Tax code of SR has been set up in Cvent for any registraion product for an event
And the same Tax Code SR has been added to the EM Event in SF
When I proceed to register for an France event

Then the content of the Json will be:
| Field | Value |
| authorityName | France TVA |
| sellerRegistration | GB 243315784 |
| taxRateCode | SR |
